plot outline: Venkat (Rohit) is a college student and the son of a retired military official (Radha Ravi). He is in love with Dr. Priya (Janapriya). Priya tells him about her dark past and how her former lover fell off a balcony. Vankat's father arranges Venkat's marriage with another woman (Sushmita). Dr. Sundar is also in love with Priya, but it is a one-sided love.
title: Oru Murai Sollividu
plot: Venkat (Rohit) is a college student and the son of a retired military official (Radha Ravi). He is in love with Dr. Priya (Janapriya). Priya tells him about her dark past and how her former lover fell off a balcony. Vankat's father arranges Venkat's marriage with another woman (Sushmita). Dr. Sundar is also in love with Priya, but it is a one-sided love.
